characterInfo.Appears in: The Way of Kings, Words of Radiance, Oathbringer, Rhythm of War,  The Sunlit Man

characterDescription:
Sigzil is an Azish bridgeman and a member of Bridge Four. He was formerly apprenticed to Hoid and has prior military experience, likely as a sergeant. He is also a Worldsinger.
Sigzil is an educated man, though his education was never completed.
